#summary Open Movement Downloads

= [Downloads] =

Open Movement is an open source project.  To get your hand on the source for the *software*, *firmware*, *hardware*, or *mechanical* aspects of the devices, see:
  * [Source Source page].

For downloadable and on-line documentation, see:
  * [Documentation Documentation page]

The below downloads are also listed on the [http://code.google.com/p/openmovement/downloads/list downloads] page.


== Software Binaries ==

Some of these utilities require the [http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?id=22 .NET Framework 3.5 SP1]:

  * [https://openmovement.googlecode.com/svn/downloads/OmGui%20beta%2013.exe] (Includes driver and CSV converter)
  * [http://code.google.com/p/openmovement/downloads/detail?name=AX3-Utils-Win-2.zip AX3 Utilities r2 (Windows)]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/openmovement/downloads/detail?name=WAX3-Utils-Win.zip WAX3 Utilities (Windows)]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/openmovement/downloads/detail?name=OMPA_plugin%20v0.1.zip OMPA Plugin v0.1 (Windows)]

Drivers:

  * [http://code.google.com/p/openmovement/downloads/detail?name=AX3-Driver-Win-5.zip AX3 Driver (Windows) r5]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/openmovement/downloads/detail?name=WAX3-Driver-Win-2.zip WAX3 Driver r2 (Windows)]
